languages.text: Чернь ленива, потому разумные господа добавляют в их ежедневное причастие вещества, обеспечивающие покорность и трудолюбие. Эти чудодейственные растительные химикаты, очищенные и подвергнутые возгонке, заставят простолюдина забыть об усталости и тщетных развлечениях. Когда же тело его истощится и выгорит, его просто заменит новый труженик.

traits.locale_text: Начать выращивать незаконные в Империуме стимуляторы для работяг, которые позволяют работать 24 на 7, а потом тихо умирать через пару месяцев.

languages.text: Since the grimy masses are so lazy, a wise lord will add substances to their daily communion that ensure obedience and diligence. Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.
languages.original_text: Чернь ленива, потому разумные господа добавляют в их ежедневное причастие вещества, обеспечивающие покорность и трудолюбие. Эти чудодейственные растительные химикаты, очищенные и подвергнутые возгонке, заставят простолюдина забыть об усталости и тщетных развлечениях. Когда же тело его истощится и выгорит, его просто заменит новый труженик.

traits.locale_text: Since the rabble is lazy, a wise lord will add substances to their daily communion that ensure obedience and diligence. Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.

Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.

And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.

Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.

Since the grimy masses are so lazy, a wise lord will add substances to their daily communion that ensure obedience and diligence. Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.

languages.text: Puesto que la plebe mugrosa es tan vaga, un señor astuto añadirá sustancias a su comunión diaria que garantizan su obediencia y diligencia. Una vez purificadas y destiladas, estas sustancias químicas milagrosas de origen vegetal harán que un plebeyo olvide su cansancio y la futilidad de sus pasatiempos. Y cuando su cuerpo, marchito y ajado, no dé más de sí, se le puede sustituir por otro.
languages.original_text: Since the grimy masses are so lazy, a wise lord will add substances to their daily communion that ensure obedience and diligence. Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.

traits.locale_text: Puesto que la plebe mugrosa es tan vaga, un señor astuto añadirá sustancias a su comunión diaria que garantizan su obediencia y diligencia. Una vez purificadas y destiladas, estas sustancias químicas milagrosas de origen vegetal harán que un plebeyo olvide su cansancio y la futilidad de sus pasatiempos. Y cuando su cuerpo, marchito y ajado, no dé más de sí, se le puede sustituir por otro.

languages.text: Puisque les masses crasseuses se complaisent à ce point dans la paresse, un seigneur avisé incorporera à leur communion quotidienne des substances à même de garantir une obéissance zélée. Après purification et distillation, ces miraculeux produits chimiques d'origine végétale aideront la populace à oublier sa fatigue et sa propension à l'oisiveté. Et quand les travailleurs seront devenus exsangues, il suffira de les remplacer.
languages.original_text: Since the grimy masses are so lazy, a wise lord will add substances to their daily communion that ensure obedience and diligence. Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.

traits.locale_text: Puisque les masses crasseuses se complaisent à ce point dans la paresse, un seigneur avisé incorporera à leur communion quotidienne des substances à même de garantir une obéissance zélée. Après purification et distillation, ces miraculeux produits chimiques d'origine végétale aideront la populace à oublier sa fatigue et sa propension à l'oisiveté. Et quand les travailleurs seront devenus exsangues, il suffira de les remplacer.

languages.text: 既然这群乌合之众如此懒惰，明智的领主就应该在他们的每日圣餐中添加一些补剂，让他们保持勤勉与顺从。经过蒸馏与提纯之后，这些神奇的植物性化学物质就能让他们忘却一身疲惫，不再留恋无用的消遣。一旦他们的身体燃烧殆尽、不堪重用，马上就会有新的劳动力取代他们。
languages.original_text: Since the grimy masses are so lazy, a wise lord will add substances to their daily communion that ensure obedience and diligence. Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.

traits.locale_text: 既然这群乌合之众如此懒惰，明智的领主就应该在他们的每日圣餐中添加一些补剂，让他们保持勤勉与顺从。经过蒸馏与提纯之后，这些神奇的植物性化学物质就能让他们忘却一身疲惫，不再留恋无用的消遣。一旦他们的身体燃烧殆尽、不堪重用，马上就会有新的劳动力取代他们。

languages.text: 不浄な大衆は非常に怠惰であるため、賢明な領主は、従順さと勤勉さを保証する物質を毎日の聖餐に加えるべきだ。ひとたび精製され、蒸留されれば、これらの真に奇跡的な植物由来の化学物質は、平民の疲労と目的のない娯楽を忘れさせるだろう。そして、彼らの肉体が燃え尽き枯れれば、新しい労働者と入れ替えればいいのだ。
languages.original_text: Since the grimy masses are so lazy, a wise lord will add substances to their daily communion that ensure obedience and diligence. Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.

traits.locale_text: 不浄な大衆は非常に怠惰であるため、賢明な領主は、従順さと勤勉さを保証する物質を毎日の聖餐に加えるべきだ。ひとたび精製され、蒸留されれば、これらの真に奇跡的な植物由来の化学物質は、平民の疲労と目的のない娯楽を忘れさせるだろう。そして、彼らの肉体が燃え尽き枯れれば、新しい労働者と入れ替えればいいのだ。

languages.text: Da die dreckigen Massen so faul sind, mischt ein weiser Herrscher in ihre tägliche Kommunion Substanzen, die Gehorsam und Fleiß garantieren. Wenn sie gereinigt und destilliert wurden, können diese wahrlich wundersamen pflanzenbasierten Chemikalien einen einfachen Bürger seine Erschöpfung und seine sinnlosen Hobbys vergessen lassen. Und wenn sein Körper ausgebrannt und verkümmert ist, wird er einfach durch einen neuen Arbeiter ersetzt.
languages.original_text: Since the grimy masses are so lazy, a wise lord will add substances to their daily communion that ensure obedience and diligence. Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.

traits.locale_text: Da die dreckigen Massen so faul sind, mischt ein weiser Herrscher in ihre tägliche Kommunion Substanzen, die Gehorsam und Fleiß garantieren. languages.text: Tembelliğe çözüm getirmenin yanı sıra itaati ve çalışkanlığı sağlamak için bilge bir lord, avama bazı maddeler verecek. Bitki bazlı bu harikulade kimyasallar, saflaştırılıp damıtıldıklarında sıradan yurttaşlara yorgunluklarını ve gereksiz uğraşlarını unutturacaktır. Vücutları bitkin düşüp yittiğindeyse yerlerine yeni işçiler getirilecektir.
languages.original_text: Since the grimy masses are so lazy, a wise lord will add substances to their daily communion that ensure obedience and diligence. Once purified and distilled, these truly miraculous plant-based chemicals will make a commoner forget their fatigue and their purposeless pastimes. And once their body is burnt out and withered, they will simply be replaced by a new worker.
